Task Adapter 1.6.0: support for Microsoft Project MPP files

Jan 3, 2012 â€¢ Author: admin

Task Adapter 1.6.0 is ready for download. Highlights:

  • Support for Microsoft Project MPP files (read-only)
  • Redesigned User Interface
  • Better support for 3-rd party software compatible with Microsoft Project (like Ganttproject)
  • Minor improvements for MantisBT onnector
  • Lots of bugfixes

Tested with Redmine 1.3.0, Atlassian JIRA 4.4.4, MantisBT 1.2.8, Microsoft Project 2010 Prof, current Github.com website.
